statements: SELECT * FROM robot_sensor_data ORDER BY sensor_id DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type FROM robot_sensor_data WHERE sensor_value > 50
SELECT * FROM robot_sensor_data WHERE sensor_type LIKE 'Temperature%'
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_value FROM robot_sensor_data WHERE sensor_value BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY sensor_value ASC
SELECT MAX(sensor_value) AS max_value, MIN(sensor_value) AS min_value FROM robot_sensor_data
SELECT * FROM robot_sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_type, sensor_value FROM robot_sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY sensor_value DESC;
SELECT sensor_type, AVG(sensor_value) AS avg_value FROM robot_sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_type;
SELECT * FROM robot_sensor_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT COUNT(sensor_id) AS total_sensors, MAX(sensor_value) AS max_value FROM robot_sensor_data;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, sensor_value, timestamp FROM robot_sensors;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, sensor_value, timestamp FROM robot_sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature';
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, sensor_value, timestamp FROM robot_sensors ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, sensor_value, timestamp FROM robot_sensors WHERE sensor_value > 50;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, sensor_value, timestamp FROM robot_sensors WHERE sensor_type LIKE 'Humidity%' ORDER BY sensor_value DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, sensor_value, timestamp FROM robot_sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT log_id, sensor_id, log_message, created_at FROM sensor_logs WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM robot_sensors JOIN sensor_logs ON robot_sensors.sensor_id = sensor_logs.sensor_id WHERE sensor_type = 'Pressure' AND sensor_value > 100 ORDER BY robot_sensors.sensor_id ASC;
SELECT sensor_type, COUNT(sensor_id) AS total_sensors FROM robot_sensors GROUP BY sensor_type HAVING COUNT(sensor_id) > 1;
SELECT log_id, sensor_id, log_message, created_at FROM sensor_logs WHERE sensor_id IN (SELECT sensor_id FROM robot_sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Motion') ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM Robot;
SELECT name, sensor1, sensor2 FROM Robot;
SELECT id, name FROM Engineer;
SELECT * FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT id, value FROM SensorData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM Robot WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, sensor1, sensor2 FROM Robot WHERE sensor1 >= 50 AND sensor2 < 30;
SELECT rd.id, rd.timestamp, rd.value, r.name FROM SensorData rd JOIN Robot r ON rd.sensor_id = r.id;
SELECT e.name AS engineer_name, e.role, e.experience, r.name AS robot_name, r.sensor1 FROM Engineer e JOIN Robot r ON e.id = r.id WHERE e.experience > 5;
SELECT r.id, r.name, sd.timestamp, sd.value FROM Robot r JOIN SensorData sd ON r.sensor1 = sd.sensor_id WHERE sd.value BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY sd.timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM Robot;
SELECT robot_name, manufacturer FROM Robot ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type FROM Sensor WHERE robot_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM SensorData WHERE value > 10 ORDER BY collected_date ASC;
SELECT engineer_name, specialization FROM Engineer WHERE engineer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Robot;
SELECT robot_name, manufacturer FROM Robot WHERE creation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT engineer_name, specialization FROM Engineer WHERE specialization IS NOT NULL ORDER BY engineer_name DESC;
SELECT Sensor.sensor_id, SensorData.collected_date, SensorData.value FROM Sensor JOIN SensorData ON Sensor.sensor_id = SensorData.sensor_id;
SELECT EngineerLog.engineer_id, EngineerLog.log_date, EngineerLog.action FROM EngineerLog ORDER BY EngineerLog.log_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Robot;
SELECT id, name, model FROM Robot ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, manufacturer FROM Robot WHERE model = 'A1';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Sensor;
SELECT type, range FROM Sensor WHERE resolution = 'high' ORDER BY range DESC;
SELECT * FROM Robot WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, name, model FROM Robot WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Robotics';
SELECT Sensor.type, Location.latitude, DataLog.value FROM Sensor JOIN DataLog ON Sensor.id = DataLog.sensor_id JOIN Location ON DataLog.location_id = Location.id;
SELECT Analysis.analysis_type, Location.longitude FROM Analysis INNER JOIN Location ON Analysis.location_id = Location.id WHERE Analysis.sensor_id = 2;
SELECT MAX(value) AS max_value, MIN(value) AS min_value FROM DataLog WHERE sensor_id = 3;
